net.canarymod

Class BlockIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.BlockIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<Block>

    public class BlockIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<Block>
    Iterator wrapper for a LineTracer
